question: What is the initial corpus of Long Term Irrigation Fund (LTIF)?
explanation: Long Term Irrigation Fund (LTIF) was announced in the Union Budget 2016-17 with an initial corpus of Rs 20,000 crore.LTIF has instituted in NABARD as a part of Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY) for funding and fast-tracking incomplete major and medium irrigation projects.
